name: Free pixel art Tile set
description:
This is a tile set that was made for Juice Jam II game - Mozuk

Feel free to use it as you like.

The files i incuded have tileset for the Castle/Dungeon, Main character sprite sheets, skeleton sprite sheets, and some basic paralax background layers.

Also including Aseprite files if you want to fix up or improve the animations.

You can test out how everythng looks together here- https://dragoonsitis.itch.io/juicejamii
